channel.title: CVE Feed for SoftLab -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SoftLab -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-29771|2024-03-27T12:58:25.517Z -- SoftLab -- Dracula Dark Mode - The Revolutionary Dark Mode Plugin For WordPress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SoftLab Dracula Dark Mode - The Revolutionary Dark Mode Plugin For WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Dracula Dark Mode - The Revolutionary Dark Mode Plugin For WordPress: from n/a through 1.0.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-29811|2024-03-27T12:11:23.044Z -- SoftLab -- Radio Player
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SoftLab Radio Player allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Radio Player: from n/a through 2.0.73.

item.title: CVE-2024-32506|2024-04-17T08:05:01.695Z -- SoftLab -- Radio Player
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in SoftLab Radio Player.This issue affects Radio Player: from n/a through 2.0.73.

item.title: CVE-2024-33592|2024-04-25T14:52:26.775Z -- SoftLab -- Radio Player
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in SoftLab Radio Player.This issue affects Radio Player: from n/a through 2.0.73.

item.title: CVE-2024-2906|2024-03-26T12:25:39.778Z -- SoftLab -- Radio Player
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in SoftLab Radio Player.This issue affects Radio Player: from n/a through 2.0.73.
